item.description:
Forro band, JATIR & BANDA - Só Pra Forrozear! will be playing at Johnny D's.

Cover charge is $10.

The Johnny Ds website posts that Samba Tremeterra will be playing with them, however I received confirmation from the group that they will not be playing.

Sorry the advertising is confusing, Samba Tremeterra is a band and also a promoter for Jatir e Banda.

For those who do not know Forro, it is a really fun music/dance from the northeast of Brazil.

For those who want some quality and quieter time to converse in Portuguese, I ask you to come early, one hour before the music starts. The music is scheduled to start at 10pm, so be there at 9pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be sitting at the bar at 9pm and then move over to the dance floor when the music starts.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Forró at Johnny Ds - JATIR & BANDA - Só Pra Forrozear!
